archimate:Requirement.name: SC.2.2.6c: c) integrating the use of cloud services into an appropriate security incident management process through creating a cloud security incident management capability, establishing a cloud security incident management process and developing cloud service-specific security incident management plans.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
